quest.name: Three-star Veteran Clan Hunt
journal: Estrild of the Shiokaze Hostelry persists in keeping a close, enlisting eye on passersby.

dialogue.name: ESTRILD
dialogue.text: Well, if it isn't our good Forename. Come closer, let me see for myself how far you've come since last we met.

dialogue.name: ESTRILD
dialogue.text: Just as I expected. You look a deal stronger than before. The hunt has been good to you, and you to it, I hope.

dialogue.name: ESTRILD
dialogue.text: The time has come for you to set out on ever more dangerous hunts. The three-stars await you. Go and speak with Wlveva once more. May the gods see fit to see you back alive.

dialogue.name: ESTRILD
dialogue.text: Take care on the hunt, lest you become the hunted.

dialogue.name: WLVEVA
dialogue.text: So, Estrild tells me you are ready for our three-star hunts. You should know, to suggest such a thing is a great show of confidence in your ability.

dialogue.name: WLVEVA
dialogue.text: Very well. I will trust her in this. Our three-star mark bills are yours to undertake.

dialogue.name: WLVEVA
dialogue.text: But know that no words of warning will suffice. The monsters you hunt are no normal beasts. They are hellish. Unrelenting. You must know well what both you and they are capable of before you face them.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Three-star Veteran Clan mark bills are now available.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You are now able to undertake three-star Veteran Clan mark bills from the Clan Hunt boards in Kugane and Rhalgr's Reach.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: New quests and elite Veteran Clan mark bills will become available from Estrild at the Shiokaze Hostelry upon reaching level 70.

dialogue.name: ESTRILD
dialogue.text: The time has come for you to set out on ever more dangerous hunts. Our three-stars await you. Go and speak with Wlveva once more. May the gods see fit to see you back alive.
